1 <?php

3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
6 use Ubiquity\controllers\Controller;
7 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
8 use Ubiquity\orm\DAO;
9 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
10 use Ubiquity\controllers\Router;
11 
21 abstract class RestBaseController extends Controller , RestControllerUtilitiesTrait {
22  protected $config;
23  protected $model;
24  protected $contentType;
25  protected $restCache;
26  protected $useValidation = true;
27 
32  protected $responseFormatter;
33 
38  protected $server;
39 
40  public function __construct() {
41  if (! \headers_sent ()) {
42  @\set_exception_handler ( array ($this,'_errorHandler' ) );
43  $this->config = Startup::getConfig ();
44  $this->server = $this->_getRestServer ();
45  $this->server->cors ();
46  $this->responseFormatter = $this->_getResponseFormatter ();
47  $this->server->_setContentType ( $this->contentType );
48  $this->restCache = CacheManager::getRestCacheController ( \get_class ( $this ) );
49  }
50  if (! $this->isValid ( Startup::getAction () ))
51  $this->onInvalidControl ();
52  }
53 
54  public function index() {
55  $routesPath = Router::getRoutesPathByController ( get_class ( $this ) );
56  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->format ( [ "links" => $routesPath ] );
57  }
58 
59  public function isValid($action) {
60  if (isset ( $this->restCache ["authorizations"] )) {
61  if (\array_search ( $action, $this->restCache ["authorizations"] ) !== false) {
62  return $this->server->isValid ();
63  }
64  }
65  return true;
66  }
67 
68  public function onInvalidControl() {
69  throw new \Exception ( 'HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized, you need an access token for this request', 401 );
70  }
71 
76  public function connect() {
77  $this->server->connect ( $this );
78  }
79 
80  public function initialize() {
81  $this->connectDb ( $this->config );
82  }
83 
84  public function finalize() {
85  parent::finalize ();
86  $this->server->finalizeTokens ();
87  }
88 
89  public function _errorHandler($e) {
90  $code = 500;
91  if ($e->getCode () !== 0)
92  $code = $e->getCode ();
93  $this->_setResponseCode ( $code );
94  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->formatException ( $e );
95  }
96 
97  public function _setResponseCode($value) {
98  \http_response_code ( $value );
99  }
100 
108  public function _get($condition = "1=1", $include = false, $useCache = false) {
109  try {
110  $condition = \urldecode ( $condition );
111  $include = $this->getInclude ( $include );
112  $useCache = UString::isBooleanTrue ( $useCache );
113  $datas = DAO::getAll ( $this->model, $condition, $include, null, $useCache );
114  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->get ( $datas );
115  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
116  $this->_setResponseCode ( 500 );
117  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->formatException ( $e );
118  }
119  }
120 
128  public function _getOne($keyValues, $include = false, $useCache = false) {
129  $keyValues = \urldecode ( $keyValues );
130  $include = $this->getInclude ( $include );
131  $useCache = UString::isBooleanTrue ( $useCache );
132  $data = DAO::getOne ( $this->model, $keyValues, $include, null, $useCache );
133  if (isset ( $data )) {
134  $_SESSION ["_restInstance"] = $data;
135  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->getOne ( $data );
136  } else {
137  $this->_setResponseCode ( 404 );
138  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->format ( RestError::notFound ( $keyValues, "RestController/getOne" )->asArray () );
139  }
140  }
141 
142  public function _format($arrayMessage) {
143  return $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->format ( $arrayMessage );
144  }
145 
153  public function _getManyToOne($ids, $member, $include = false, $useCache = false) {
154  $this->getAssociatedMemberValues_ ( $ids, function ($instance, $member, $include, $useCache) {
155  return DAO::getManyToOne ( $instance, $member, $include, $useCache );
156  }, $member, $include, $useCache, false );
157  }
158 
167  public function _getOneToMany($ids, $member, $include = false, $useCache = false) {
168  $this->getAssociatedMemberValues_ ( $ids, function ($instance, $member, $include, $useCache) {
169  return DAO::getOneToMany ( $instance, $member, $include, $useCache );
170  }, $member, $include, $useCache, true );
171  }
172 
181  public function _getManyToMany($ids, $member, $include = false, $useCache = false) {
182  $this->getAssociatedMemberValues_ ( $ids, function ($instance, $member, $include, $useCache) {
183  return DAO::getManyToMany ( $instance, $member, $include, null, $useCache );
184  }, $member, $include, $useCache, true );
185  }
186 
193  public function _update(...$keyValues) {
194  $instance = DAO::getOne ( $this->model, $keyValues,false );
195  $this->operate_ ( $instance, function ($instance) {
196  $datas = $this->getDatas ();
197  $this->_setValuesToObject ( $instance, $datas );
198  if ($this->_validateInstance ( $instance, array_keys ( $datas ) )) {
199  return $this->updateOperation($instance, $datas,true);
200  }
201  return null;
202  }, "updated", "Unable to update the instance", $keyValues );
203  }
204 
209  public function _add() {
210  $model = $this->model;
211  $instance = new $model ();
212  $this->operate_ ( $instance, function ($instance) {
213  $datas = $this->getDatas ();
214  $this->_setValuesToObject ( $instance, $datas );
215  if ($this->_validateInstance ( $instance, $datas )) {
216  return $this->AddOperation($instance, $datas,true);
217  }
218  return null;
219  }, "inserted", "Unable to insert the instance", [ ] );
220  }
221 
227  public function _delete(...$keyValues) {
228  $instance = DAO::getOne ( $this->model, $keyValues );
229  $this->operate_ ( $instance, function ($instance) {
230  return DAO::remove ( $instance );
231  }, "deleted", "Unable to delete the instance", $keyValues );
232  }
233 
234  public static function _getApiVersion() {
235  return '?';
236  }
237 
242  public static function _getTemplateFile(){
243  return 'restController.tpl';
244  }
245 }
